title: plugout_tta
description: Connects to AFNI and receives notification whenever the user changes Talairach coordinates, then drives Netscape to display the closest figures from the Talairach-Tournoux atlas.

host.title: Host
host.description: Connect to AFNI running on the specified computer using TCP/IP. Use '-host localhost' to connect on current host with TCP/IP.

port.title: Port Number
port.description: Use TCP/IP port number 'pp'. Default is 8005.

verbose.title: Verbose Flag
verbose.description: Verbose mode: prints out progress reports.

port_offset.title: Port Offset
port_offset.description: Provide a port offset to allow multiple instances of programs to communicate on the same machine. All ports are assigned numbers relative to PORT_OFFSET. Range: [1025, 65500].

port_offset_quiet.title: Port Offset Quiet
port_offset_quiet.description: Like -np, but more quiet in the face of adversity.

port_offset_bloc.title: Port Offset Block
port_offset_bloc.description: Provide a port offset block. Easier to use than -np. Range: [0, MAX_BLOC]. Using this reduces chances of port conflicts.

max_port_bloc.title: Max Port Block
max_port_bloc.description: Print the current value of MAX_BLOC and exit.

max_port_bloc_quiet.title: Max Port Block Quiet
max_port_bloc_quiet.description: Print MAX_BLOC value and exit quietly.

num_assigned_ports.title: Number of Assigned Ports
num_assigned_ports.description: Print the number of assigned ports used by AFNI then quit.

num_assigned_ports_quiet.title: Number of Assigned Ports Quiet
num_assigned_ports_quiet.description: Print the number of assigned ports used by AFNI then quit quietly.
